languages.text: "Утверждение частично истинно. Я внес в алгоритмическую цепь уравнения-обереги, что охранят цифровой дух от скверны ереси. Ксеноаугменты, внедренные в мою Плоть, не постигнуты, незнание причиняет боль. Но, милостью Омниссии, мой анализ покорит их тайны. Мученичество есть путь к Познанию".

"This statement is partly true. I have introduced protective equations into the algorithmic chain to guard the digital spirit against the corruption of heresy. The xeno-augmetics embedded in my flesh are yet to be comprehended — the lack of knowledge is painful. But, by the Omnissiah's grace, my analysis will conquer their mysteries. Martyrdom is the path to Knowledge."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение частично истинно. Я внес в алгоритмическую цепь уравнения-обереги, что охранят цифровой дух от скверны ереси. Ксеноаугменты, внедренные в мою Плоть, не постигнуты, незнание причиняет боль. Но, милостью Омниссии, мой анализ покорит их тайны. Мученичество есть путь к Познанию".

languages.text: “这种说法部分正确。我已经在算法链中加入了保护性方程式，确保数字的精神免受异端技术腐化。嵌入我肉体中的异形植入物还没有得到完全理解，知识的匮乏让我感到痛苦。然而，在欧姆尼塞亚的恩典之下，我的分析将揭示它们的奥秘。殉道是通往知识的道路。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is partly true. I have introduced protective equations into the algorithmic chain to guard the digital spirit against the corruption of heresy. The xeno-augmetics embedded in my flesh are yet to be comprehended — the lack of knowledge is painful. But, by the Omnissiah's grace, my analysis will conquer their mysteries. Martyrdom is the path to Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法部分正确。我已经在算法链中加入了保护性方程式，确保数字的精神免受异端技术腐化。嵌入我肉体中的异形植入物还没有完全理解，知识的匮乏让我感到痛苦。然而，在欧姆尼塞亚的恩典之下，我的分析将揭示它们的奥秘。殉道是通往知识的道路。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esa declaración es parcialmente cierta. He añadido ecuaciones protectoras a la cadena algorítmica para proteger el espíritu digital contra la corrupción de la herejía. Los xenoauméticos injertados en mi carne aún son incomprensibles: la falta de conocimiento es dolorosa. Pero por la gracia del Omnissiah mi análisis conquistará sus misterios. El martirio conduce al conocimiento».
languages.original_text: "This statement is partly true. I have introduced protective equations into the algorithmic chain to guard the digital spirit against the corruption of heresy. The xeno-augmetics embedded in my flesh are yet to be comprehended — the lack of knowledge is painful. But, by the Omnissiah's grace, my analysis will conquer their mysteries. Martyrdom is the path to Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «Esa declaración es parcialmente cierta. He añadido ecuaciones protectoras a la cadena algorítmica para proteger el espíritu digital contra la corrupción de la herejía. Los xenoauméticos injertados en mi carne aún son incomprensibles: la falta de conocimiento es dolorosa. Pero por la gracia del Omnissiah mi análisis conquistará sus misterios. El martirio conduce al conocimiento».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉は部分的には真実だ。自分は異端による腐敗から電子精霊を守るため、アルゴリズムの連鎖に保護方程式を導入した。自分の肉体に埋め込まれたゼノ・オーグメティックはまだ解明されていない…知識の欠如とは苦しみだ。しかし、万機神の恩寵により、私の分析はその謎を克服するだろう。殉教は知識への道である」
languages.original_text: "This statement is partly true. I have introduced protective equations into the algorithmic chain to guard the digital spirit against the corruption of heresy. The xeno-augmetics embedded in my flesh are yet to be comprehended — the lack of knowledge is painful. But, by the Omnissiah's grace, my analysis will conquer their mysteries. Martyrdom is the path to Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉は部分的には真実だ。自分は異端による腐敗から電子精霊を守るため、アルゴリズムの連鎖に保護方程式を導入した。自分の肉体に埋め込まれたゼノ・オーグメティックはまだ解明されていない…知識の欠如とは苦しみだ。しかし、万機神の恩寵により、私の分析はその謎を克服するだろう。殉教は知識への道である」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist teilweise korrekt. Ich habe Schutzgleichungen in die Algorithmuskette eingefügt, um die digitale Seele vor der Verderbnis der Ketzerei zu beschützen. Die in mein Fleisch eingebettete Xeno-Augmetik wird noch nicht vollständig verstanden — dieser Mangel an Wissen ist schmerzhaft. Doch durch die Gnade des Omnissiah werden meine Analysen ihre Mysterien ergründen. Das Märtyrertum ist der Pfad zum Wissen."
languages.original_text: "This statement is partly true. I have introduced protective equations into the algorithmic chain to guard the digital spirit against the corruption of heresy. The xeno-augmetics embedded in my flesh are yet to be comprehended — the lack of knowledge is painful. But, by the Omnissiah's grace, my analysis will conquer their mysteries. Martyrdom is the path to Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist teilweise korrekt. Ich habe Schutzgleichungen in die Algorithmuskette eingefügt, um die digitale Seele vor der Verderbnis der Ketzerei zu beschützen. Die in mein Fleisch eingebettete Xeno-Augmetik wird noch nicht vollständig verstanden — dieser Mangel an Wissen ist schmerzhaft. Doch durch die Gnade des Omnissiah werden meine Analysen ihre Mysterien ergründen. Das Märtyrertum ist der Pfad zum Wissen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est en partie vraie. J'ai introduit des équations protectrices dans la chaîne algorithmique de façon à empêcher l'hérésie de corrompre l'esprit numérique. Les xéno-augmétiques incrustés dans ma chair échappent encore à ma compréhension et créent de douloureuses lacunes, Mais par la grâce de l'Omnimessie, mon analyse percera leurs mystères. C'est par le martyre que l'on trouve le savoir. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is partly true. I have introduced protective equations into the algorithmic chain to guard the digital spirit against the corruption of heresy. The xeno-augmetics embedded in my flesh are yet to be comprehended — the lack of knowledge is painful. But, by the Omnissiah's grace, my analysis will conquer their mysteries. Martyrdom is the path to Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est en partie vraie. J'ai introduit des équations protectrices dans la chaîne algorithmique de façon à empêcher l'hérésie de corrompre l'esprit numérique. Les xéno-augmétiques incrustés dans ma chair échappent encore à ma compréhension et créent de douloureuses lacunes, Mais par la grâce de l'Omnimessie, mon analyse percera leurs mystères. C'est par le martyre que l'on trouve le savoir. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This statement is partly true. I have introduced protective equations into the algorithmic chain to guard the digital spirit against the corruption of heresy. The xeno-augmetics embedded in my flesh are yet to be comprehended — the lack of knowledge is painful. But, by the Omnissiah's grace, my analysis will conquer their mysteries. Martyrdom is the path to Knowledge."

languages.text: "Bu önerme kısmen doğru. Dijital ruhu kâfirlik yozlaşmasından koruması için algoritmik zincire birtakım koruyucu denklemler yerleştirdim. Bedenime katılan zeno ogmetikleri henüz idrak edilmedi. Bilgi eksikliği acı verici. Gelgelelim analizlerim, Hermesih'in lütfuyla gizemlerinin üstesinden gelecektir. İrfana giden yol, şehitlikten geçer."
languages.original_text: "This statement is partly true. I have introduced protective equations into the algorithmic chain to guard the digital spirit against the corruption of heresy. The xeno-augmetics embedded in my flesh are yet to be comprehended — the lack of knowledge is painful. But, by the Omnissiah's grace, my analysis will conquer their mysteries. Martyrdom is the path to Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme kısmen doğru. Dijital ruhu kâfirliğin yozlaşmışlığına karşı koruması için algoritmik zincire bazı koruyucu denklemler yerleştirdim. Bedenime katılan zeno ogmetikleri henüz idrak edilmemiş durumdalar. Bilgi eksikliği acı verici. Analizlerim, Hermesih'in lütfuyla gizemlerinin üstesinden gelecektir ama. İrfana giden yol şehitlikten geçer."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
